title: Gauri Lankesh's killers took shelter in Satara house after murder?
article_body: The SIT team last month raided a house in Satara where the suspects in the Gauri murder case, including Parashuram Waghmore, had apparently taken shelter for a month after committing the crime. A police officer confirmed the raid. Police sources said investigations into the Lankesh murder have unearthed important information regarding the murders of rationalists and Govind Pansare from and M M Kalburgi from Karnataka.
